sections.text: denial.If the commission refuses to grant an application made pursuant to section 86-135, no new application for the same advanced telecommunications capability service shall be filed or shall be considered by the commission until one year has elapsed after the date of mailing of the commission order.SourceLaws 1969, c. 601, § 4, p. 2458;Laws 1994, LB 414, § 111;R.S.1943, (1996), § 75-615;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 37;Laws 2012, LB715, § 7.

86-138.Application denial.

If the commission refuses to grant an application made pursuant to section 86-135, no new application for the same advanced telecommunications capability service shall be filed or shall be considered by the commission until one year has elapsed after the date of mailing of the commission order.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 601, § 4, p. 2458;Laws 1994, LB 414, § 111;R.S.1943, (1996), § 75-615;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 37;Laws 2012, LB715, § 7.
